channel.title: SOAP on Ninja Snacks
channel.description: Recent content in SOAP on Ninja Snacks

item.title: Why is it so Slow?
item.description: Recently, a client wanted to know why certain product they had installed was performing so horribly from their overseas office when it worked just fine over here. I had my suspicions but I wanted to confirm it. So, I had him put in fiddler. If you haven’t heard of this tool, get it now. It will save you a ton of time when debugging any http issue. Anyway, my suspicions were confirmed: This is actually from the IE debugging tools but you get the idea.
